Gets the tension and heart rate going, second to Alien Isolation (my favourite game). As a noob, I quickly got into to it and very cathartic to be able to hunt your mates :-)

Only thing I'm not a fan of is the in game purchases - doesn't take away from playing the game, but feel it's not necessary and could easily be dropped.
